title: If you were trapped on an island with a murderous champ
body:
Who would it be

{{champion:143}}  for me because reasons ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

replies.body: {{champion:67}}  because she's most likely to tumble off a cliff and then blame the island for no peel.
I'd go with {{champion:121}} because he only goes after prey that will help him evolve. :P
You know me!! Everybody knows I absolutely **_LOVE_** this champ so much!!! It's 100%, without a doubt, gotta be {{champion:56}}. What'd you expect me to say?

> [{quoted}](name=Twitch Main,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=JiAghEOG,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-08-03T22:55:59.462+0000)
>
> You know me!! Everybody knows I absolutely **_LOVE_** this champ so much!!! It's 100%, without a doubt, gotta be {{champion:56}}. What'd you expect me to say?

Fuck u m8,

Stole me champion.

For a freaking joke nonetheless!

So it has to be a murderous one? Then I'm gonna go with Jhin.
He won't kill me unless he has an audience
[https://media.giphy.com/media/MGCTZalz2doFq/giphy.gif](https://media.giphy.com/media/MGCTZalz2doFq/giphy.gif)

Yeah, after all what is the point of a show without someone there to "appreciate it"
{{champion:202}} {{champion:202}} {{champion:202}} {{champion:202}}
{{champion:15}} Because I'm poor. She won't hurt someone if it doesn't profit her, Right?
{{champion:17}} why, so i can kick him into the shark infested water
He'll just blind you, which also magically turns the force of your kick into a gentle breeze.

{{champion:31}} 

I'm not going to explain why. You can figure it out.
The likelihood of you having Monster Hunting weapons is low
I can still kick!
Yeah and at his smallest size he's probably the same height as Mordekaiser, which means he's gonna still eat you alive
you're no fun...
I'm plenty fun, I'm just pointing out the flaw of your life choice to prevent your death
but  its supposed to be a murderous champ! I'm supposed to die!
{{champion:102}} I wouldn't put it past her to kill someone out of annoyance
{{champion:429}} ... Probably my best option... That hasn't been taken
Insert obligatory {{champion:103}}  answer here.
i guess for me it would have to be battle bunny riven and good god that splash art and the way the focus on the curve of her tight lil heart shaped ass.

http://st.elohell.net/public/chill/9427b63459ed8d14acf72c5e1f1f2d6c.jpg
